## Identifiers
There are 180 rows and 68 columns in the tidy data. 


Variable list & descriptions
------------------------------

Variable name    | Description
-----------------|------------
subject          | ID the subject who performed the activity for each window sample. It ranges from 1 to 30
activity         | The type of activity performed when the corresponding measurements were taken
Measurements     | Mean of activity
Labels           | Walking & Sitting
